text: A Wreath in Time is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars Mack Sennett, Florence Lawrence, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== * Mack Sennett as John Goodhusband * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. John Goodhusband * Linda Arvidson as At Stage Door * Charles Avery as At Stage Door * Flora Finch as Actress on Stage * George Gebhardt as In Bar / Actor on Stage * Robert Harron as Messenger ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: A Wreath in Time
